text: Hi everyone! I'm new to HubSpot development. I was wondering if the design manager exists in the boilerplate theme or is that something I have to enable? When I click on a template, I only see HTML instead of the design manager and I don't see an option to change to that view.
First image is what I see. Second image is what I am looking for.
<@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6> can anyone explain the new design manager changes? I can't seem to copy modules on their own to another portal anymore
